abstract: Joe Nocera Op-Ed column comments on dispute between Rutgers University faculty and university's athletics department over finances; contends while Rutgers sports have consistently bled money, to tune of $26 million in 2014, fact that school is now a member of Big Ten conference means academics will be the loser.
lead_paragraph: A fight ensues on the New Jersey campus over money spent on big-time athletics instead of academics.

headline.main: At Rutgers, It’s Books vs. Ballgames
headline.print_headline: At Rutgers, It’s Books vs. Ballgames

snippet: A fight ensues on the New Jersey campus over money spent on big-time athletics instead of academics.

keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations
